title: Accidental purchase.
body: So I wanted to buy Vlad for IP but i miss clicked and i bought it for rp ... please refund me.

replies.body: You have 3 refunds tokens for exactly those cases. If you already used it there is no Way of refunsing.
All 3 refunds have been used, is there really no other way, I had WAY MORE than enough ip to buy him, now i dont even have enough rp for a skin /;
Aha!  In this case just hit us up in a ticket, and we'll see if we can find any options.  Again, no guarantees but it's worth a shot.  :)
nope there is no other way.

Oops!  If you have any refund tokens, you can use it to refund your points per the [refund ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)guidelines.  I'm not sure what more we can do if you're out of tokens, but we do like to look into each case individually.  If that's the case for you, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll take a look!
